verses.verse: And when Abram <WH87> was ninety <WH8673> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and nine <WH8672>, the Lord <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> to Abram <WH87>, and said <WH559> unto him <WH7706>, I am the Almighty God <WH410>; walk <WH1980> before me <WH6440>, and be perfect <WH8549>.
And I will make <WH5414> my covenant <WH1285> between me and you <WH7235>, and will multiply you exceedingly <WH3966>.
And Abram <WH87> fell <WH5307> on his face <WH6440>: and God <WH430> talked <WH1696> with him <WH559>, saying,
As for me <WH589>, behold <WH1285>, my covenant is with you <WH1>, and you shall be a father of many <WH1995> nations <WH1471>.

Neither shall your name <WH8034> any more be called <WH7121> Abram <WH87>, but your name <WH8034> shall be Abraham <WH85>; for a father <WH1> of many <WH1995> nations <WH1471> have I made you <WH5414>.
And I will make <WH6509> you exceeding <WH3966> fruitful <WH6509>, and I will make <WH5414> nations <WH1471> of you <WH4428>, and kings shall come out of you <WH3318>.

And I will establish <WH6965> my covenant <WH1285> between me and you and your seed <WH2233> after you <WH310> in their generations <WH1755> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>, to be a God <WH430> unto you <WH2233>, and to your seed after you <WH310>.

And I will give <WH5414> unto you <WH2233>, and to your seed after you <WH310>, the land <WH776> wherein you are a stranger <WH4033>, all the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, for an everlasting <WH5769> possession <WH272>; and I will be their God <WH430>.
And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto Abraham <WH85>, You shall keep <WH8104> my covenant <WH1285> therefore <WH2233>, you, and your seed after you <WH310> in their generations <WH1755>.
This is my covenant <WH1285>, which you shall keep <WH8104>, between me and you and your seed <WH2233> after you <WH310>; Every man child <WH2145> among you shall be circumcised <WH4135>.
And you shall circumcise <WH5243> the flesh <WH1320> of your foreskin <WH6190>; and it shall be a token <WH226> of the covenant between me and you <WH1285>.

And he that is eight <WH8083> days <WH3117> old <WH1121> shall be circumcised <WH4135> among you <WH2145>, every man child in your generations <WH1755>, he that is born <WH3211> in the house <WH1004>, or bought <WH4736> with money <WH3701> of any stranger <WH1121>, which is not of your seed <WH2233>.

He that is born <WH3211> in your house <WH1004>, and he that is bought <WH4736> with your money <WH3701>, must needs <WH4135> be circumcised <WH4135>: and my covenant <WH1285> shall be in your flesh <WH1320> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>.

And the uncircumcised <WH6189> man child <WH2145> whose <WH834> flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin <WH6190> is not circumcised <WH4135>, that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people <WH5971>; he has broken <WH6565> my covenant <WH1285>.

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto Abraham <WH85>, As for Sarai <WH8297> your wife <WH802>, you shall not call <WH7121> her name <WH8034> Sarai <WH8297>, but <WH3588> Sarah <WH8283> shall her name be <WH8034>.

And I will bless <WH1288> her <WH5414>, and give you a son <WH1121> also of her <WH1288>: Yes, I will bless her <WH1471>, and she shall be a mother of nations; kings <WH4428> of people shall be of her <WH5971>.

Then Abraham <WH85> fell <WH5307> upon his face <WH6440>, and laughed <WH6711>, and said <WH559> in his heart <WH3820>, Shall a child be born <WH3205> unto him that is a hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>? And shall Sarah <WH8283>, that is ninety <WH8673> years <WH8141> old <WH1323>, bear <WH3205>?
And Abraham <WH85> said <WH559> unto God <WH430>, O that <WH3863> Ishmael <WH3458> might live <WH2421> before you <WH6440>!

And God <WH430> said <WH559>, Sarah <WH8283> your wife <WH802> shall bear <WH3205> you a son <WH1121> indeed <WH61>; and you shall call <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Isaac <WH3327>: and I will establish <WH6965> my covenant <WH1285> with him for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>, and with his seed <WH2233> after him <WH310>.

And as for Ishmael <WH3458>, I have heard you <WH8085>: Behold <WH1288>, I have blessed him <WH6509>, and will make him fruitful, and will multiply <WH7235> him exceedingly <WH3966>; twelve <WH6240> princes <WH5387> shall he beget <WH3205>, and I will make him <WH5414> a great <WH1419> nation <WH1471>.
But my covenant <WH1285> will I establish <WH6965> with Isaac <WH3327>, which Sarah <WH8283> shall bear <WH3205> to you at this set time <WH4150> in the next <WH312> year <WH8141>.
And he left off <WH3615> talking <WH1696> with him <WH430>, and God went up <WH5927> from Abraham <WH85>.

And Abraham <WH85> took <WH3947> Ishmael <WH3458> his son <WH1121>, and all that were born <WH3211> in his house <WH1004>, and all that were bought <WH4736> with his money <WH3701>, every male <WH2145> among the men <WH582> of Abraham <WH85>'s house <WH1004>; and circumcised <WH4135> the flesh <WH1320> of their foreskin <WH6190> in the same <WH6106> day <WH3117>, as God <WH430> had said to him <WH1696>.
And Abraham <WH85> was ninety <WH8673> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and nine <WH8672>, when he was circumcised <WH4135> in the flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin <WH6190>.
And Ishmael <WH3458> his son <WH1121> was thirteen <WH6240> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, when he was circumcised <WH4135> in the flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin <WH6190>.
In the same <WH6106> day <WH3117> was Abraham <WH85> circumcised <WH4135>, and Ishmael <WH3458> his son <WH1121>.
And all the men <WH582> of his house <WH1004>, born <WH3211> in the house <WH1004>, and bought <WH4736> with money <WH3701> of the stranger <WH1121>, were circumcised with him <WH4135>.
